body_html:
Are you using keras for your LSTM or tf.nn.dynamic_rnn?

from keras.layers import LSTM

then I used it for training exactly like the aforementioned code.

(in order for us to test this properly on our end; we need a full reproducible code example; as minimal as possible)

Believe me the main code is just what I provided above. the rest is just data preparation for the network. anyway if you still think my code is something special, I can send it to you.

body:

`from keras.layers import LSTM`

then I used it for training exactly like the aforementioned code.
